reviews.review: This game is probably the best horror game out there in my opinion, Really love it would recommend checking it out sometime.

生存者側4人がマップに散らばる発電機を修理して儀式からの脱出を目指し、殺人鬼側1人がそれを阻止するゲームです。
妖しく光る月や幽かに立ち籠める霧の雰囲気はホラーゲームとしてとても良くできています。
生存者と殺人鬼の役割が異なるので、追われる緊張感や追いかける高揚感を味わえるゲーム…でした。

対戦ゲームである以上、キャラクター間のバランス調整の問題は致し方ない部分もありますが、
昨今では運営のバランス調整が下手すぎてゲーム性が損なわれるくらいバランス崩壊しています。

とにかく発電機の修理スピードが早く、殺人鬼側が脱出を阻止するのが非常に難しくなっています。
逆に生存者側はあっという間に脱出ゲートが開いてしまい、儀式中に殺人鬼に会わずに終わってしまうこともあります。
また、殺人鬼側でなんとか戦える殺人鬼も運営のナーフによって毎回使い物にならないくらい弱体化されます。
殺人鬼側として磨いた技術や戦法は運営の鶴の一声で全て無になります。殺人鬼いじめはもうやめてください。
生存者側も運営の加護があると気付けるようになると自分の腕前で脱出したというよりはゲームのバランス的に脱出できて当たり前なんだなと感じるようになります。

さらにこのゲームの運営はバグの修正が非常に下手です。
新キャラ実装前に行われるテストプレイで報告されているバグですら修正しないでそのまま実装することもあります。
また、1回でもプレイすれば気づくようなバグがたくさん発生します。社内テストを行っているのかと問い詰めたくなります。
1つのバグを直すと3つのバグが発生すると言われるくらいたくさん発生します。もううんざりします。

結論としましては、これから始める方や初心者の方に関しては一度は体験してもいいかと思います。
わちゃわちゃしながら一緒に脱出できたときの喜びを味わえると思います。
しかし、中級者以上を目指したいと思っている方や、殺人鬼側をやろうと思う方にはおすすめできません。
特に殺人鬼側は心無い生存者からの挑発行為がストレスになると思います。
それを乗り越えて強くなった殺人鬼たちは運営によって死刑宣告されます。

ゲームデザインやゲーム性に関しては非常に気に入っています。でなければ3000時間もやりません。
いつかまたこのゲームを心の底から楽しめる時が来ることを願っています。
朋友推荐的，当了一段时间云玩家，然后终于买了游戏。真的很喜欢杀鸡

I really like the set up of Dead by Daylight, it's challenging but fun at the same time. Adore the feature that once you die you don't have to sit and wait for the rest of your team to finish. The list of famous killers makes it exciting to see who is chasing me next. I do with there were more things to earn for free to play but the game isn't that expensive so it's expected. Overall really enjoying the game and attempting to be a decent killer.

The game I bought 5 years ago, was a very different game. 
It was a brand new concept and very fun to play, you had a good time if you played as a survivor or a killer. 

Unfortunatly today, the game is a shadow of its former self. 

The game is highly unbalanced, the devs seem to completely ignore the community and the community is treating it as an e-sports game.

Treating it as an e-sports game, has some very negative consequences for the game overall.

Examples of this, are survivors working together over voice chat (discord)  which makes it incredibly hard for the killer to do anything to counter. 

As a killer you will experience alot of teabagging, one dedicated person looping you around the map, while the others tunnel down on generators.

And alot of flashlights in your face, followed by even more teabagging. 

I do not recommend this game at the present for any potential buyers, due to how the game handles matchmaking. 
You will get matched with the most experienced of players and you will be completely outplayed.

The game suffers from balancing issues, matchmaking issues, technical issues and essentially sells a monthly season pass in game. 
(while it is possible to get a big chunk of the items without spending more money, it will take you years to get there. Some are behind a paywall.)

Some of the perks in the game are also stuck behind having to pay for characters. (That would be okay, if not for some perks being very OP and almost essential to have.)

I hope things turn around, but right now I can't recommend it.

Dbd é um jogo que consegue ser divertido em seus primeiros momento de gameplay caso você possua amigos com os quais possa jogar e tendo assim uma primeira experiência boa. O real problema com o jogo está na sua falta de conteúdo, não há realmente muita coisa que os sobreviventes possam fazer além de consertar geradores e isso torna o jogo extremamente massante com o tempo, diferente dos killers que possuem poderes e características únicas além de claro suas perks ensináveis. Minha real decepção com o jogo esta apenas na parte de sobrevivente, nenhum deles possui algo que os diferencia já que suas perks podem ser passadas para outros a partir do nível 30 (assim como os killers); Porém a partir do momento em que você desbloqueia uma perk ensinável os sobreviventes se tornam apenas skins não tendo absolutamente nada que os diferem além do design e vozes.  Por fim não vou entrar no fato do jogo ser extremamente mal otmizado, pois é algo tão escroto que nem vale apena se aprofundar nisso.

Enfim caso você se interesse pelo jogo e possua amigos, é uma excelente escolha pra sair da rotina e jogar por algumas horas e conseguir algumas risadas com coisas inesperadas ou até mesmo bugs.

This game is legit terrible now. SBMM has honestly killed the game. Once you get to a high enough MMR (determined by the number of kills you get each trial, not hooks) on any given killer you are met with nothing but bully squads and tryhards. This wouldn't be an issue if ranked mode weren't the only way to play this game. Until they implement dedicated Casual and Ranked modes you best not waste your time or money on this game. This game used to be a lot of fun as either killer or survivor but now there seems to be loads of garbage on either side. From bad hit validation that will cheat you out of hits/pallet drops for killer/survivor, to perks that make almost no damn sense, this game has seen better days and I really wish the devs would do something about it. All-in-all not the worst game I've ever played, in fact one of my favorite games until recently.

Overall it's a great game with great features and everything, being a killer is very very hard at 1st but can get easier with time. The survivors still get the advantage considering they have so much more option like pallet saving or flashlight saving your downed teammates. It can get very frustrating at times but overall it's a game that really makes you use 99.9% of your brain to outrun the killer or to predict the survivor, if i had to rate out of 10 I would say 8.5.

Ну, что же я могу сказать об этой игре? Продукт весьма интересный, и пока на рынке каких-либо конкурентоспособных аналогов не имеет. Можно хорошенько напрячь себя, как и при игре за выжившего, так и за убийцу. Либо расслабиться и почилить с друзьями. 

Онлайн у игрушки очень даже высокий, учитывая, что проект далеко не от топовой студии. Единственным минусом для меня является, пожалуй, лишь отсутствие дополнительных режимов, дабы хоть как-то разнообразить геймплей. Было бы неплохо, если бы разработчики завозили временные ивенты, привносящие новые механики, и дающие возможность сделать глоток свежего воздуха.

The matchmaking is a joke. I sometimes play in my free time and all I go against are super toxic no life players who know every single trick in the game and never make mistakes. The games where I think I have a chance, BOOM hacker. This game was really fun until the matchmaking made the game more stress than fun.

The dev's don't give a fuck about you, only want your money. They'll take your feedback, spit on it, throw it in a blender, and serve it back to you with a shiny wrapping paper and charge you $8. RIP Hillbilly 2018
Every time I play this game I am reminded of what pain feels like, and yet I keep coming back. 10/10
